name: I Rely on the Informant System to Be an Enthusiastic Citizen in the Criminal Investigation Story
summary: Guan Xia was reborn with her memories intact, always believing she was living a second chance at life with a determined, self-improvement storyline.From the moment she could speak, she diligently studied painting and pursued art school based on her past-life experiences and passions, eventually becoming a moderately famous comic artist. By twenty-five, she had achieved her dream of early retirement.Life was perfectGuan Xia spent her days drawing comics, traveling, and enjoying herself so much she hardly missed her old life.Then one day, a murder occurred in her apartment building. When the police came by for routine questioning, a sudden interface popped up in Guan Xias mind, displaying:Informant System Successfully Bound.You are being questioned by the police. Suddenly, you rememberon April 19th at 5:53 PM, while returning home, you passed a nervous-looking maintenance worker in the hallway. There were faint stains on his sleeves, and your sharp intuition tells you they might be blood. You decide to report this to the police.Guan Xia: ?
author: NovelFire
